resources.string: Denley is what I would call a Ninja developer. He\'s at the top of the game - at least 3 times more efficient than someone who charges 1/2 the hourly rate. I couldn\'t be more pleased with his work, and it\'s been nothing but a pleasure to work with him.

Fantastic developer. Continual communication, educated opinion and happy to work towards 100% satisfaction. I recommend Denley for any Android app job where quality and updatability is required. Code is clean, well thought-out and well commented. Adheres to good programming practices and was happy to fix any bugs and interface issues as they arose without complaint. Very happy with this project, developer and final deliverable

Denley is a true professional, with solid Android knowledge and a great attention to detail. Count on him to produce a high quality, well thought out app. He did a fantastic job on my project, meeting all the requirements (even more!) and replied quickly to my requests/feedbacks. The highest recommendation for promptness, responsiveness, communication, expertise and quality of work. A top choice for any Android app development, worth every penny. I\'m very impressed, I can\'t say enough positive things. Just awesome, will hire again.

Denley has been excellent in working on this android app. Great ideas to turn the requirements into reality, great work ethic, great support. Communication and response times very good. Highly recommended.
Denley is really the sort of developer you are seldom to meet: \n1) he understands what is important and what isn\'t \n2) he likes what he does and takes the responsibility for it
